name: starlife-advert-bot
description: Telegram investment bot with PostgreSQL database

scripts.setup-db: node -e "const { Pool } = require('pg'); const pool = new Pool({ connectionString: process.env.DATABASE_URL }); require('fs').readFile('database.sql', 'utf8', (err, sql) => { if (err) throw err; pool.query(sql, (err) => { if (err) console.error(err); else console.log('Database setup complete'); pool.end(); }); });"

author: Starlife Advert
